title: I can't open LoL or any other online game like Overwatch
body: So yea my LoL client won't open and when I run troubleshoot  compability it says that I have incombatible program. And I don't know what to do  and same thingh for Battle.net for Overwatch.  But,  I can only play LoL when i update my windows again . But , that takes too long.   Please help , thanks!

replies.body: What operating system are you using?  Do you have your games properties set to run the game through a compatibility mode?  I'm not totally sure I understand what's going on, so anymore details could help .  Let me know!
